definitions.title: n.m
definitions.body: bitter thing, bitter herb (cf. NH id., bitter herb; on form v. Ba:NB 194);—only pl. [[מְרׂרִים]] Ex 12:8, Nu 9:11, [[מְרוֹרִים]] La 3:15; —bitter herbs, in Passover meal Ex 12:8, Nu 9:11 (both P); cf. ´[[הִשְׂבִּיעַנִי בַּמּ]] La 3:15, fig. of distress inflicted (‖[[לַעֲנׇה]]).
